name: attribute-invalid-unit-class
description: A schema unit class issue, saying there is an unknown one.
common_causes: Referencing non-existent unit classes in unitClass attributes
Using deprecated or removed unit classes
Missing unit class definitions in schema
explanation: UnitClass attributes must reference valid unit classes defined in the schema. Invalid unit class references cause validation failures and prevent proper unit validation.
correction_strategy: Use valid unit class names that exist in the schema

correction_examples.explanation: Replaced unknown unit class with valid one

correction_patterns: Verify unit class exists in schema
Check unit class name spelling and case
Use defined unit class names only
Remove references to non-existent unit classes
fix_instructions: 1. Check available unit classes in schema
validation_hints: Cross-reference with schema unit class definitions
Check unit class name case sensitivity
Verify unit class exists before referencing
